label: Soft Remote
info_overview: The NodOn® Soft Remote controls any compatible receivers Z-Wave® or Z-Wave Plus®, such as the Smart Plug NodOn®. It can address, directly, up to 4 groups of 8 devices and sent up to 16 different scenes to a Home Automation Gateway. This controller can operate on its own (“Standalone” Mode) or as gateway’s assistant (“Gateway” Mode). The product integrates a LED, which give an intuitive feedback for each operation you perform.
info_inclusion:
1. Simultaneously push on I and P, during 1sec. The LED glows in pink to confirm the selection
  2. Push on I, within 10 seconds. The LED blinks in pink to confirm your choice The LED blinks in green to confirm the procedure
info_exclusion:
1. Simultaneously push on I and P, during 1sec. The LED glows in pink to confirm the selection
  2. Push on I, within 10 seconds. The LED blinks in pink to confirm your choice The LED blinks in green to confirm the procedure
info_wakeup: Press on any button of the Soft Remote.
category_description: Any portable or hand-held device that controls the status of something, e.g. remote control, keyfob etc.

parameters.description: To set-up the profile of buttons 1 and 3
